resources.string: This window activity initiates a QRCODE simulator scan. Check HELP to Learn more. In relation to the simulation in this alarm clock app, You have no choice but to wake-up and scan a barcode of your own preference for this alarm to be turned off. Have a GoodDay!!!
Tap SCAN to Cancel the Alarm

This app is based on a QRCODE simulator scan. On pressing the scan button a simulator scanner will initiate turning your phones camera into a barcode or a QRcode reader. Primarily, you are required to scan a Barcode (mainly found on your shampoo or any other product in your house hold) to quit the annoying ringing. You have no choice but to wake-up and scan a barcode of your own preference for this alarm to be turned off. You do not have to be a tech Guru to use incredibly easy app. Now To all those Heavy sleepers have fun getting past this,that is if you DARE!!!
This App was developed by Yours Truly Kelvin Keegan
